name: Vinabook.com
description:
Founded in 2004, MeKongCom Corp. with the brand Vinabook.com is the one of the leading B2C e-commerce companies with the mission is to be no.1 e-tailer in Vietnam.

Currently, Vinabook.com offers 50,000 products for sale online (mainly books, softwares, movies & music) & have more than 200,000 active customers.

Other activity of MeKong Com Corp is publishing books with the brand Youbooks.
